abstract: Yahoo will announce new tools for online advertising that could pull the company ahead in the race to better tailor online advertisements to the people most likely to buy.
snippet: Yahoo will announce new tools for online advertising that could pull the company ahead in the race to better tailor online advertisements to the people most likely to buy.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo will announce new tools for online advertising today that could pull the company ahead in the race for what is called “behavioral targeting,” that is, the ability to better tailor online advertisements to the people most likely to buy.

headline.main: Online Customized Ads Move a Step Closer
headline.print_headline: Online Customized Ads Move a Step Closer

abstract: The stock surges for Local.com because it was granted two patents related to local searches and free, ad-supported 411 services. It’s potentially a huge business that companies like Google, Microsoft, Yahoo and others are fighting to dominate.
snippet: The stock surges for Local.com because it was granted two patents related to local searches and free, ad-supported 411 services. It’s potentially a huge business that companies like Google, Microsoft, Yahoo and others are fighting to dominate.
lead_paragraph: Local.com is one of many search engines specializing in finding hometown businesses and services like dry cleaners or restaurants. In May, it reported losses of $3.1 million for the first quarter of the year and forecast a slightly larger loss for the current quarter. And as of Thursday, shares of the Irvine, Calif.-based company were trading below $4.

headline.main: Gunning for Licensing Rights to Local Search

abstract: After an employee criticized Michael Moore’s health care documentary on an official blog, Google now says it agrees with Mr. Moore’s concerns and even screened his movie for 1,000 employees.
snippet: After an employee criticized Michael Moore’s health care documentary on an official blog, Google now says it agrees with Mr. Moore’s concerns and even screened his movie for 1,000 employees.
lead_paragraph: It was a firestorm over Michael Moore’s movie “Sicko” that Google didn’t intend, didn’t anticipate and now is trying to defuse.

headline.main: Google Shares (Some of) Michael Moore’s Concerns

abstract: Google buys Grand Central, the service that rings all your phones with one number.
snippet: Google buys Grand Central, the service that rings all your phones with one number.
lead_paragraph: Google said today it is buying GrandCentral Communications, which offers users a single number that can be set to ring their mobile, home or work phones. The two-year-old company also offers a unified voice-mail that can be accessed over the Web.
